Uses of Interface
com.opengamma.strata.pricer.credit.CreditRatesProvider

  • Packages that use CreditRatesProvider 
    Package Description
    com.opengamma.strata.measure.credit
    Calculation functions for credit products.
    com.opengamma.strata.pricer.credit
    Calculators for credit instruments, such as Credit Default Swap (CDS).
    com.opengamma.strata.pricer.sensitivity
    Calculators for sensitivities.

    • Uses of CreditRatesProvider in com.opengamma.strata.measure.credit

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      CreditRatesProvider CreditRatesMarketData.creditRatesProvider()
      Gets the credit rates provider.
      CreditRatesProvider CreditRatesMarketDataLookup.creditRatesProvider​(MarketData marketData)
      Obtains credit rates provider based on the specified market data.
